p: Curiosity about sex is a natural and significant component of adolescence, which is often regarded as a topic that is taboo in Chinese society ( 7). Misconceptions of sex have also been spread by the media, increasing misunderstandings for teenagers and leading to infections from sexual transmitted diseases (STDs) and unwanted teenage pregnancies ( 8). Teenage infections with STDs have long been a concern in Taiwan, especially from gonorrhea ( Figure 2) ( 9). In 2020, the number of teenagers infected with gonorrhea increased by almost 90%, yet the infection rate for adults only increased by 50% ( 9).
